name: 10" Easy Clean Standard Axle Flat Finishing Box
description_short: Professional-Grade Design– Perfect for finishing coats and achieving smooth, even seams on drywall and sheetrock.
description_full:
Professional-Grade Design

– Perfect for finishing coats and achieving smooth, even seams on drywall and sheetrock.

Easy Clean System

– Simple removable door and quick-flush design make cleanup faster and less messy at the end of the day.

Standard Compatibility

– Works with all standard flat box handles, providing flexibility and ease of use for pros and crews. Also, created with standard parts for easy replacement of common wear parts.

Durable Tie Rod Construction

– Built with Drywall Master’s original tie rod design, delivering unmatched strength and long service life.

Chicago Family-Owned Quality

– Proud family owned in Chicago, IL, ensuring Midwest craftsmanship and reliability.

The

Drywall Master Easy Clean Standard Axle Flat Finishing Box

is the go-to tool for drywall professionals who need consistent, reliable performance. Designed for standard capacity, this box is ideal for applying finishing coats over taped joints, producing smooth, even seams on walls and ceilings. The

Easy Clean system

makes end-of-day cleanup quick and hassle-free, reducing downtime and keeping your tools in top condition. With Drywall Master’s

original tie rod design

and heavy-duty alloy construction, this finishing box is built to withstand the toughest job site conditions. Compatible with all standard flat box handles, it offers versatility and durability trusted by pros nationwide.

Extra Strong Stainless Tie Rods hold the body together

Other Available Box Sizes

5.5”, 7”, 10", 12” and 14”

name: 3M Particulate Respirator Dust Mask (20-Pack)
description_short: The3M Paint Sanding Respiratoris used for non-harmful dusts from sanding, grinding, sawing and insulating particles. The advanced filter media makes for easier breathing. Easy to use, comfortable and lightweight, the 3M Paint Sanding Respirator is a great choice in respiratory protection for both the professional and the DIYer.
description_full:
The

3M Paint Sanding Respirator

is used for non-harmful dusts from sanding, grinding, sawing and insulating particles. The advanced filter media makes for easier breathing. Easy to use, comfortable and lightweight, the 3M Paint Sanding Respirator is a great choice in respiratory protection for both the professional and the DIYer.

Provides at least 95% filtration efficiency against solid and liquid aerosols that do not contain oil

Free of components made of natural rubber latex

Non-valved, disposable respirator

NIOSH approved: N95

Adjustable nose clip reduces potential for eyewear fogging and helps ensure a custom and secure seal

1 size fits most

*  NO ATTACHMENTS INCLUDED

name: A2 Dual Angle Fine Abrasive Drywall Sponges 100ct

Angled sides aid in sanding interior angles without damaging adjacent walls, ceilings or trim

name: Advance 10" Box Trail Knife

Designed to run behind mud boxes to smooth out edges and eliminate bubbles and ripples.

Using a Box Trail Knife eliminates the need for brushing (sanding) between coats.

No special poles or handles needed attaches to any common pole with a threaded end.

Lightweight to prevent fatigue.

name: Advance 11" Adjustable Stainless Steel Wipedown Knife
description_short: Introducing the exceptionalAdvance 11" Adjustable Stainless Steel Wipedown Drywall Knife,proudly made in the USA. Designed to meet the highest quality and functionality standards, this tool is a must-have for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike.
description_full:
Introducing the exceptional

Advance 11" Adjustable Stainless Steel Wipedown Drywall Knife,

proudly made in the USA. Designed to meet the highest quality and functionality standards, this tool is a must-have for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike.

Featuring an adjustable angle blade, this drywall knife empowers you to tackle various drywall finishing tasks effortlessly. You can achieve the perfect angle for smooth and precise application with a simple adjustment. The blade securely locks into position, ensuring stability throughout your work.

This wipedown knife is crafted from premium, hardened stainless steel and guarantees unmatched durability. Its rugged construction can withstand the rigors of demanding projects, maintaining its exceptional performance over time. Trust in the resilience of this American-made tool for consistent and reliable results.

The 18-inch plastic handle is thoughtfully designed with threading to accommodate an extension pole. This feature provides you with extended reach and added versatility, allowing you to work on high walls or ceilings comfortably. Experience greater efficiency and convenience with this remarkable attribute.

Upgrade your drywall finishing with the Advance 11" Adjustable Stainless Steel Wipedown Drywall Knife. Crafted with precision and pride in the USA, it combines durability, adjustability, and compatibility with extension poles to elevate your workflow. Trust in the excellence of this tool and achieve outstanding results in your drywall projects.

name: Advance 7" Adjustable Stainless Steel Wipedown Knife
description_short: Introducing the remarkableAdvance 7" Adjustable Stainless Steel Wipedown Drywall Knifedesigned to enhance your drywall finishing tasks. This indispensable tool combines convenience, durability, and versatility to ensure exceptional results.
description_full:
Introducing the remarkable

Advance 7" Adjustable Stainless Steel Wipedown Drywall Knife

designed to enhance your drywall finishing tasks. This indispensable tool combines convenience, durability, and versatility to ensure exceptional results.

The highlight of this drywall knife is its adjustable angle blade, allowing you to adapt to different angles and surfaces effortlessly. You can achieve the perfect angle for your specific drywall finishing needs with a simple adjustment. The blade securely locks into place, providing stability and precision throughout your work.

This wipedown knife is crafted from high-quality, hardened stainless steel and guarantees long-lasting performance. Its exceptional durability ensures it can withstand the demands of frequent use without compromising its effectiveness. Say goodbye to worn-out tools and experience the reliability of this premium stainless steel construction.

The 18-inch plastic handle is threaded to accommodate an extension pole, granting you extended reach and flexibility. This feature lets you quickly access high ceilings or distant corners, making your drywall finishing projects more efficient and convenient.

Elevate your drywall finishing with the Advance 7" Adjustable Stainless Steel Wipedown Drywall Knife. description_full:
TapeTech BAZOOKA™ Continuous Flow Drywall Tools

finish drywall projects faster than ever before when you keep your taping tool continuously at work on the wall while the Bazooka system provides a continuous flow of compound into your choice of tools.

Unlike traditional taping tools, that must be loaded and reloaded using a hand pump; Bazooka Continuous Flow can work continuously without having to stop and reload. Best of all, current Automatic Taping Tool users can move up to Bazooka Continuous Flow with minimal training.

name: Ames Cobra Dry Tape Banjo
description_short: The new Ames Cobra Banjo Dry Tape Banjo Drywall Taping Tool.
description_full:
The new Ames Cobra Banjo Dry Tape Banjo Drywall Taping Tool.

The Ames Cobra Dry Tape Drywall Banjo Taper applies drywall compound to drywall tape and increases speed over traditional drywall hand taping. The banjo taper holds up to a 500' roll of tape, and strings 40' per load. The aluminum construction is sturdy and light-weight. The lid is beveled inward to create a leak-proof, metal-to-metal seal.

The dry tape banjo gets its name from having the roll of drywall tape separated from the wet drywall compound - keeping the roll dry and only applies mud to the tape lead. This Goldblatt style banjo is the most popular design among drywall contractors.

Ames Cobra Silver Drywall Tape Banjo w/ Wooden Handle AB0004 Features:

Quality Aluminum Construction

Top wood handle for vertical drywall tape application

Side strap and thumb rest for horizontal drywall tape application

Additional Wooden Handle can be used in place of the side strap

Serrated Tape Cutting Blade

Adjustable mudflow with the turn of a thumb screw

name: Apla-Tech 5ft Air Cannon Complete w/ 50ft Hose
description_short: TheApla-Tech Air Cannonwill allow you to finish corners in a fraction of the time compared to traditional methods.  It is air powered you can use thicker mud and adjust the airflow to allow you to finish at the speed of your choosing.  It will work with just about any sized air compressor.  To fill the tool, you will use a standard drywall loading pump.  Simply fill the tool, flip on your air compressor, pull the trigger, and go!
description_full:
The

Apla-Tech Air Cannon

will allow you to finish corners in a fraction of the time compared to traditional methods.  It is air powered you can use thicker mud and adjust the airflow to allow you to finish at the speed of your choosing.  It will work with just about any sized air compressor.  To fill the tool, you will use a standard drywall loading pump.  Simply fill the tool, flip on your air compressor, pull the trigger, and go!

The Air Cannon is a much more balanced design compared to other methods because the entire tube gets filled with mud instead of just the head.  Also, It holds more mud than any corner box, TapeTech MudRunner or Dewalt MudShot.  This allows you to

run much longer distances before having to refill.

All brands of angle heads, mud heads, corner applicators, flat applicators, and direct corner flushers will attach to the Air Cannon.

name: Apla-Tech Continuous Flow Automatic Taper
description_short: TheApla-Tech Continuous Flow Automatic Taperis a high-performance drywall finishing tool designed for professionals in the construction industry. The taper is designed to streamline the drywall taping process, reducing the time and effort required to achieve a smooth and professional finish.
description_full:
The

Apla-Tech Continuous Flow Automatic Taper

is a high-performance drywall finishing tool designed for professionals in the construction industry. The taper is designed to streamline the drywall taping process, reducing the time and effort required to achieve a smooth and professional finish.

The Apla-Tech Continuous Flow Automatic Taper features a durable and lightweight aluminum body designed to be easy to use and maneuver. The taper is equipped with an adjustable control system that precisely controls the amount of joint compound dispensed.

The taper is also designed with a continuous flow system that ensures a consistent and steady flow of joint compound, which helps to eliminate the need for frequent refills. The machine is also equipped with an automatic cleaning system that ensures that the taper is always clean and ready for use.

The Apla-Tech Continuous Flow Automatic Taper comes with a range of features designed to enhance its functionality and ease of use. The machine is equipped with a quick-release lid that makes it easy to clean.

Overall, the Apla-Tech Continuous Flow Automatic Taper is an essential tool for any professional in the drywall finishing industry. Its durable construction, advanced features, and ease of use make it an indispensable tool for achieving a professional and efficient drywall finish.

Available in 28" or 36"

Removable Head for Easy Cleanup

Stop Only To Change the Roll of Tape

Minimal Moving Parts

Contractor Grade- Built Strong & Durable

Tape Flats & Angles As Fast As You Want

Trigger Gun NOT INCLUDED

Your coating distance isn't 28 to 40 lineal feet before refilling, it's at the end of the day when you stop to cleanup you tools. And, these ergonomically designed finishing tools are easy on the body. You do not push

AplaTech introduces the Continuous Flow System (CFS) tools for drywall taping, finishing and texturing. Now you can do all three of these processes without stopping to fill up. name: Apla-Tech T-Series Drywall Texture Machine 15 Gallon
description_short: TheApla-Tech T-Series Drywall Texture Machine 15 Gallonis a versatile and powerful machine for applying drywall texture and finishes to walls and ceilings. The machine is designed to provide a smooth and even finish while reducing the time and effort required for the job.
description_full:
The

Apla-Tech T-Series Drywall Texture Machine 15 Gallon

is a versatile and powerful machine for applying drywall texture and finishes to walls and ceilings. The machine is designed to provide a smooth and even finish while reducing the time and effort required for the job.

The 15-gallon hopper on the machine can hold a large amount of drywall texture material, which reduces the need for frequent refills. The machine is also equipped with a powerful compressor that provides consistent air pressure for optimal performance.

The Apla-Tech T-Series Drywall Texture Machine 15 Gallon is easy to operate and maneuver, with a compact and lightweight design that allows it to be easily transported between job sites. The machine is also designed for easy cleaning and maintenance, with a quick-release hopper and easy-to-access components.

The machine comes with various nozzles and tips, which allow for a wide range of textures to be applied, from fine to coarse. This makes it suitable for various texture finishes, including orange peel, knockdown, and popcorn finishes.

Overall, the Apla-Tech T-Series Drywall Texture Machine 15 Gallon is an excellent choice for professionals who require a reliable and efficient machine for applying drywall texture and finishes. Its powerful performance, easy-to-use design, and versatility make it an essential tool for any drywall contractor or painter.

name: Apla-Tech T-Series Weather Resistant Barrier Spray Machine 15 Gallon
description_short: TheApla-Tech T-Series Weather Resistant Barrier Spray Machine 15 Gallonis a powerful and versatile machine designed for applying weather-resistant barriers and coatings to walls and other surfaces. The machine is designed to be highly efficient, delivering consistent and even coverage for optimal performance.
description_full:
The

Apla-Tech T-Series Weather Resistant Barrier Spray Machine 15 Gallon

is a powerful and versatile machine designed for applying weather-resistant barriers and coatings to walls and other surfaces. The machine is designed to be highly efficient, delivering consistent and even coverage for optimal performance.

The 15-gallon hopper on the machine can hold a large amount of material, reducing the need for frequent refills. The machine is also equipped with a powerful compressor that provides consistent air pressure, allowing for smooth and even application of the coating.

The Apla-Tech T-Series Weather Resistant Barrier Spray Machine 15 Gallon is built with a weather-resistant design that allows it to operate effectively in harsh outdoor conditions. The machine is constructed with high-quality materials resistant to corrosion and damage, ensuring long-lasting performance.

The machine is also designed for easy operation and maintenance, with a user-friendly interface and easy-to-access components. The machine comes with various nozzles and tips, which allow for a wide range of coatings to be applied, from thin to thick.

Overall, the Apla-Tech T-Series Weather Resistant Barrier Spray Machine 15 Gallon is an excellent choice for professionals who require a reliable and efficient machine for applying weather-resistant coatings to walls and other surfaces. Its powerful performance, weather-resistant design, and ease of use make it an essential tool for any contractor or painter working on outdoor projects.

description_full: Introducing the Asgard® "HAMMER™" Automatic Taper, setting a new standard for value in drywall tools. This tool's “adjustable” feature refers to the ability to control the amount of spring pressure by engaging or disengaging one set of tension springs on the back of the angle head. Angle Heads, or Angle Finishers or Corner Finishers, are attached to the CA08-AD corner applicator to q
description_full: The Asgard® Adjustable Angle Head perfectly feathers the joint compound applied to both sides of internal corners in one pass. The Angle Head can be used for wall-to-wall internal corners or wall-to-ceiling corners. This tool's “adjustable” feature refers to the ability to control the amount of spring pressure by engaging or disengaging one set of tension springs on the back of the angle head. Angle Heads, or Angle Finishers or Corner Finishers, are attached to the CA08-AD corner applicator to quickly and professionally finish internal drywall corners. The 3” Asgard Angle Head has wheels to provide the smoothest action on the wall and is spring-loaded to help compensate for slightly imperfect corners. The Angle Head is also part of the Taping process when attached to the FH-AD or XH-AD support handles with the CFA-AD adapter.

name: AST 270 Gallon Diesel Powered Spray Rig
description_short: TheAST 270 Gallon Diesel Powered Rigsare considered the finest texture spray equipment on the market. If you have not seen one up front and personal, you are in for a pleasant surprise. We have set new standards with our current design.
description_full:
The

AST 270 Gallon Diesel Powered Rigs

are considered the finest texture spray equipment on the market. If you have not seen one up front and personal, you are in for a pleasant surprise. We have set new standards with our current design.

The diesels are optionally equipped with our new cast pump housing which includes the

Butterfly Valve

,

Max Seals

and

Star Drive

connecting rod. You will no longer dread servicing your pump because of worries over a big mess. With a turn of the valve all of the mud in the tank is shut off and the rotor and stator can be removed without leaking material on to the ground.

The wiring is heat shrink protected like the smaller gas rigs and in addition the tail lights are pop out heavy truck style lights that sit protected in the rear 3/8” thick steel bumper.

The 270 comes standard with electric trailer brakes. The box tubing frame is beefed up to 2”x 4”. The hitch size is 2-5/16” and is removable with bolts to easily adjust the height to match the tow vehicle. The axle size is increased to handle the heavy loads.

The frame is extended to distribute the towing load better and provide working space or storage on the front tongue. The tank is recessed into the frame resulting in a lower profile making it easier to load material into the tank.

Our diesel rigs are used by more big operators because they are able to handle the daily grind of heavy use. This is a full Hydraulic control system with infinite control of mixing speed and pump speed.

16” wheels (8 lug) and bearing buddies

AST special pole gun with hardened steel tips

2L4 high performance pump

Stainless steel texture strainer

High performance material hose rated at 3200lb burst

name: AST 270 Gallon Gas Powered Spray Rig
description_short: American Spray Technologies 270 Spray Texture Righas the spraying power and tank capacity to handle many wall texture jobs without stopping to mix a new batch of drywall mud. That saves you time! This texture machine is also perfect if you need a split tank for mixing two types of wall texture at once. The 70/30 split tank gives you 187 gallons on the large side and 80 gallons on the small side.
description_full:
American Spray Technologies 270 Spray Texture Rig

has the spraying power and tank capacity to handle many wall texture jobs without stopping to mix a new batch of drywall mud. That saves you time! This texture machine is also perfect if you need a split tank for mixing two types of wall texture at once. The 70/30 split tank gives you 187 gallons on the large side and 80 gallons on the small side.

Full hydraulic control and electric brakes are standard on this texture rig. You will appreciate our hydraulic control system that provides infinite control of texture mixing and pump speeds, resulting in great looking spray jobs every time. The engine size in the 270 wall texture machine is increased to 23.5 HP to give you enough power for all your drywall mixing and spraying needs. The beefy box tubing frame, 2-5/16" ball hitch and heavy-duty axle are all designed to easily handle the larger trailer load.

American Spray's 270 drywall texture rigs are optionally equipped with a new state of the art cast pump housing that includes special

Max Seals

and a

Butterfly Valve

and

Star Drive

connecting rod. These seals provide protection for the hydraulic motor while the butterfly valve shuts off the texture tank from the pump and the Star Drive connecting rod lasts twice as long.  With an AST spray texture rig, servicing your machine is a breeze and there are no big spills to clean up afterward!

Like all our drywall equipment, this texture machine is designed to last, giving you years of profitable, low-maintenance spraying.

If you need a larger spray texture rig, this is the place to start!

Standard equipment and options for the AST 270 texture spray rig are listed below:

Tube frame welded construction, to handle heavy loads

2L4 high performance pump

Stainless steel texture strainer

Easy access oil filters

name: AST 350 Gallon Diesel Powered Spray Rig
description_short: You owe it to yourself to learn about our diesel rigs. All rigs are not the same. Our 350 Diesel is one of our most popular Diesel machines. It has all of the features and benefits of the 270 Diesel plus larger tank capacity and tandem axles with brakes on all 4 wheels.The 350 comes equipped with our new stainless steel pump which includes the butterfly valve. Wiring is heat shrink protected and the tail lights are pop out heavy truck style lights that sit in the rear 3/8” steel bumper.The box t
description_full:
You owe it to yourself to learn about our diesel rigs. All rigs are not the same. Our 350 Diesel is one of our most popular Diesel machines. It has all of the features and benefits of the 270 Diesel plus larger tank capacity and tandem axles with brakes on all 4 wheels.

The 350 comes equipped with our new stainless steel pump which includes the butterfly valve. Wiring is heat shrink protected and the tail lights are pop out heavy truck style lights that sit in the rear 3/8” steel bumper.

The box tubing frame is beefed up to 2”x 6”. The hitch size is 2-5/16” and is removable with bolts to easily adjust the height to match the tow vehicle.

Like the 270 Diesel, the frame is extended to distribute the towing load better and provide working space or storage on the front tongue. The tank is recessed into the frame resulting in a lower profile making it easier to load dry or box mud into the tank.

Your new machine will have infinite control of mixing speed and pump speed at your finger tips. Mixing is a snap and adjusting your spray pattern will be easy.

350 DIESEL

Easy access for routine

maintenance

Single tank shown

(available in split tank)

STANDARD FEATURES

* Trailer mounted

* Single tank

* 25HP diesel

* Quincy QT 7.5 compressor

* 125ft hose set

* Pole gun

* Air control pump switch

* Butterfly valve pump

* Stainless steel tank, lid, hinge and mixing paddles

* Tube frame welded construction, to handle heavy loads

* Electric brakes on all four wheels

* Independent suspension Torsion arm axles

* 15” wheels and bearing buddies

* AST special pole gun with hardened steel tips

* 2L4 high performance pump

* Stainless steel texture strainer

* High performance material hose rated at 3200lb burst

* Easy access oil filters

OPTIONS

* Electric pump switch

* Binks gun

* Longer hose set

* Split tank

* Option A - Quincy QT 10 (35cfm)

* Option B - 16” tires, Quincy QT 15 (50 CFM), 33 HP Diesel

name: AST 350 Gallon Gas Powered Spray Rig
description_short: TheAST 350 Gallon Spray Machineis the largest Kohler gas powered rig AST makes. If you want capacity then this is the rig for you. You will be able to Spray multiple jobs without stopping to mix.This size is also popular with those that need a split tank. With a 70/30 split you have 221 gallons on the large side and 133 gallons on the small side.The 350 is equipped with electric trailer brakes. The box tubing frame has the strength to handle the larger load. The hitch size is 2-5/16” and the axl
description_full:
The

AST 350 Gallon Spray Machine

is the largest Kohler gas powered rig AST makes. If you want capacity then this is the rig for you. You will be able to Spray multiple jobs without stopping to mix.

This size is also popular with those that need a split tank. With a 70/30 split you have 221 gallons on the large side and 133 gallons on the small side.

The 350 is equipped with electric trailer brakes. The box tubing frame has the strength to handle the larger load. The hitch size is 2-5/16” and the axle capacity is increased to handle the heavier loads of the larger 350 tank. The engine is a 23.5 HP Kohler.

This is a full hydraulic control system and will provide years of profitable use. Like the rest of our equipment this is a low maintenance design so you will spend less time on repairs.

Your new machine will have infinite control of mixing speed and pump speed at your finger tips. Mixing is a snap and adjusting your spray pattern will be easy.

AST drywall texture rigs are optionally equipped with a new state of the art cast pump housing that includes special

Max Seals

and a

Butterfly Valve

and

Star Drive

connecting rod. These seals provide protection for the hydraulic motor while the butterfly valve shuts off the texture tank from the pump and the Star Drive connecting rod lasts twice as long.  Because of this unique design feature, you will no longer dread servicing your pump because of worries over a big mess. With a turn of the valve, the flow of mud from the texture sprayer tank to the pump body is shut off allowing the rotor and stator to be removed without leaking material on the ground. That saves you time – every time!

Standard equipment and options for the AST 350 Gas Texture Spray Machine are listed below:

Standard Features

Trailer mounted single tank with 23.5HP Kohler engine and Quincy QT 7.5 compressor

125’ hose set with pole gun, air control pump switch and stainless steel texture strainer

Stainless steel tank, lid, hinge and mixing paddles

Tube frame welded construction, to handle heavy loads

Electric brakes

Independent suspension Torsion arm axles

16” wheels (8 lug) and bearing buddies

AST special pole gun with hardened steel tips

2L4 high performance pump

Stainless steel texture strainer

High performance material hose rated at 3200lb burst

Easy access oil filters

Air activated pump

name: Benron Rotortex 245-EG Gas & Electric Powered Portable Spray Machine
description_short: TheBenron Rotortex 245EGpro gas/electric texture sprayer is ideal for the large residential and commercial contractor needing a powerful texture sprayer capable of handling a wide variety of materials: such as Drywall textures, synthetic stuccos, deck coatings, stone paints, fireproofing and more.
description_full:
The

Benron Rotortex 245EG

pro gas/electric texture sprayer is ideal for the large residential and commercial contractor needing a powerful texture sprayer capable of handling a wide variety of materials: such as Drywall textures, synthetic stuccos, deck coatings, stone paints, fireproofing and more.

The Rotortex 245-EG is configured to tackle interior and exterior jobs of all sizes with 120V power.

The Rotortex 245-EG Features:

An Extra Large Capacity Hopper with a tool tray and a quick connection to the pump

A capacity that holds up to 18 gallons of material, for less time spent refilling the hopper

Hopper that includes a lid to protect from any foreign debris getting into the material

A 120V DC Motor

Remote On/Off switch

Completely enclosed, fan-cooled design protects the motor from dust, dirt, and other debris

Reduction of noise and vibration

Extended life of pump and compressor

Sprays repeatable patterns with less material and pressure adjustments

Rotor stator pump provides smooth material flow and eliminates material pulsation

Delivers high output pressure allow longer material hose to quickly get the job done

Slow speed pump allows longer rotor stator life

Delivers material up to 100 feet

Twin-Cylinder High-Output Air Compressor

Removable air compressor

Maintenance-free design

Honda gas compressor delivers 10 cfm at 100 psi

3/4 or 1 inch Material hose, 3/8-inch Air Hose, control cord

Removable material control

Adjustable Material Flow Control

description_short: PREMIUMis redefined once more with the highest standard of all INOX double blade trowels available worldwide. description_full:
PREMIUM

is redefined once more with the highest standard of all INOX double blade trowels available worldwide. Using the framework of our flagship

PREMIUM

Finishing Trowel, the

PREMIUM

SuperFlex trowel uses the same premium manufacturing processes while elevating the trowel’s flexibility with the highest grade of INOX flexible stainless steel in the world.

We've worked with automotive manufacturers to develop an adhesive to adhere to our double blade, eliminating delaminating blades as seen on inferior trowels that use double-stick tape. Paired with 360° of flexibility around the blade, there is no finer flexible trowel.

name: Bloomington Banjo Remodelers Taping Kit
description_short: TheBloomington Banjo Remodelers Kitis an excellent choice for your next taping job.  The Bloomington Banjo applies mud and tape simultaneously.  The mudflow is adjustable to allow for the perfect amount needed.  The banjo holds up to a 500ft roll of tape.  This kit also include an inside corner roller with handle and an inside corner hand flusher.  This will allow you to bed the tape into the corner and wipe it down.  This will greatly speed up production.

Bloomington Banjo Remodelers Kit

Apply mud and tape at the same time with the Bloomington Banjo.

Finish corners in record speed.

name: Bosch 9 in Drywall Sander Kit
description_short: Bosch 9" Drywall Sander Kit - Bosch GTR55-85
description_full:
Bosch 9" Drywall Sander Kit - Bosch GTR55-85

Optimize your professional drywall projects with the Bosch GTR55-85 9" Drywall Sander. This comprehensive kit is built for superior sanding efficiency, ease of use, and reduced operator fatigue.

Kit Includes:

Bosch GTR55-85 9" Drywall Sander:

Delivers powerful, efficient performance.

Sanding Sheet, GTR801 Soft Backing Pad:

Ready for immediate use on various surfaces.

GTR024 Extension Pole:

Adjusts for different lengths to enhance reach.

VAC024 Vacuum Hose Adapter and Cable Clips:

For tidy and efficient dust management.

5mm Wrench and Durable Carrying Case:

For easy adjustments and convenient transport.

Key Features:

Ultra-Flexible Head:

Allows for precise sanding with minimal surface damage.

Dual Suction Modes:

Includes a ceiling-suction mode to lessen strain during overhead work.

Ergonomic T-Handle Grip and Quick-Release Extension Pole:

Improve comfort and control.

Easy-to-Access Controls and Speed Selector:

Ensure optimal performance and consistency.

The Bosch GTR55-85 Drywall Sander Kit is designed to provide professionals with the tools needed for high-quality, efficient sanding in demanding environments.

name: Can-Am 2.5" Standard Accu-Just Flusher
description_short: New design allows for the application of compound through the Accu-Just.
description_full:
New design allows for the application of compound through the Accu-Just.

Featuring Gold Anodized Runners with inline wheels, these premium Corner Finishers are designed to wipe, feather, and finish both sides of any inside angle between 72° and 135° in a single pass, with little need for cleanup or sanding. Precisely adjusted feathering tabs ensure a fast, uniform finish every time, while the hardened stainless steel wiping blades, and stainless runners keep them finishing over countless angles. Their lightweight aluminum bodies connect effortlessly to Flusher Handles. The patented design of the Roller Runners reduce friction for a smoother glide along the angle; eliminating chatter, and rolling over wet flat tapes without catching.

The 2.5" is Ideal for the initial coating of paper tape after rolling.

name: Can-Am NyCor 2.5" Corner Flusher
description_short: Finish inside cornersFASTERwith this 2.5″ NyCor Finisher.
description_full:
Finish inside corners

FASTER

with this 2.5″ NyCor Finisher.

Appearing in Hi-Vis Green, this is the world’s most popular corner finisher size, perfect for

taping coats (1st coat)

.

The CanAm team developed NyCor driven by the belief that

excellence in corner finishing should be accessible to everyone

.

NyCor Finishers are great for beginners and professionals alike:

For those that have always wanted to try CanAm Corner Finishers, NyCor requires

minimal investment

for similar performance.

For the veteran, NyCor can be used on the toughest of jobs to

preserve the life

of your expensive tools

There is no better corner finisher for

training your team

!

NyCor Finishers feature the following innovations:

Uniform Body

– Sculpted from uninterrupted Nylon, this design stands alone in its class.  No screws, no springs, just Nylon mastery.

Nylon 6

– Selected after rigorous testing for smooth gliding and the familiar springiness of CanAm flushers.

Precision Feathering Tabs

– Reproduces CanAm’s iconic trade secret for a best-in-class, dependable finish.

Springless Socket

– Hear the famous CanAm *click* as the flusher is secured onto a handle, allowing you to finish from any angle.

Wave Spring Technology

– Patented design ensures just the right amount of stiffness across the entire finisher to create a uniform finish.

Tip:

To maintain a consistent finish, be sure to replace your NyCor Finisher when the edges are worn!

description_full:
Achieve a world-class finish while maximizing efficiency and profitability!

The NyCor Hybrid Kit marries the best of CanAm’s 47-year history in drywall tools with the first-of-its-kind NyCor Finishers and

FAST

Adapter Technology.  This kit is built for professionals who want to do

premium corner finishing at high efficiency and minimal investment

.

NyCor Finishers emulate CanAm’s world-renowned corner finishing experience, including the following innovations:

Precision Feathering Tabs

– Reproduces CanAm’s iconic trade secret for a best-in-class, dependable finish.

Springless Socket

– Hear the famous CanAm *click* as the flusher is secured onto a handle or compound tube for standard or direct applications.

Wave Spring Technology

– Patented design ensures just the right amount of stiffness across the entire finisher to create a uniform finish.

The NyCor

quickly change

between the following tools:

Inside Corner Roller (included)

Outside Corner Roller

°

corner, removing any air bubbles and

extending the life of your corner finishers

.

name: CanAm Heavy Duty Inside Corner Roller
description_short: CanAm’s premium Heavy Duty Roller just got better.  Now featuring bearings formulated for lifelong lubrication, this roller firmly embeds tape with40% less friction, making your job that much easier.
description_full:
CanAm’s premium Heavy Duty Roller just got better.  Now featuring bearings formulated for lifelong lubrication, this roller firmly embeds tape with

40% less friction

, making your job that much easier.

Fixtured to a

solid aluminum chassis

, you can be confident that this robust roller will stand the test of time.  And as always, CanAm stands firmly behind its

Lifetime Performance Policy

.

The stainless wheels now boast a

heavy gauge wall

, maintaining the same weight you’ve always loved to achieve satisfying, crisply-embedded tape.  And if you love the solid frame, but want a lighter, more ergonomic roller, you can always substitute our Ultralight Wheels.

For those new to the trade, you may ask, “Why use a roller?”  Here’s why:

Improve Workmanship

– gain a reputation for quality taping

Peace of Mind

– eliminate air bubbles that may lift tape later

Longer Tool Life

– embedded tape is less abrasive on Corner Finishers

name: Clinch-On Cornerbead Tool -1-1/4"
description_short: CC Corp Clinch-On Tool - 1-1/4"
description_full:
CC Corp Clinch-On Tool - 1-1/4"

Master the art of drywall corner installations with the CC Corp Clinch-On Tool, a renowned leader in clinching drywall corners efficiently. This tool significantly reduces installation time while ensuring perfectly smooth and flush corners.

Key Features:

Smooth, Flush Corners:

This ensures that corners are seamless and visually appealing, enhancing the finish of any drywall project.

Effortless Operation:

A single strike from a rubber mallet tightly secures the corner bead, perfectly centers it for optimal joint compound distribution, and clinches it firmly in place without the need for nails or screws.

Versatility: This tool is available

in

1-1/4" and 1-1/8" sizes, accommodating different drywall thicknesses and specific project requirements.

The CC Corp Clinch-On Tool is essential for professionals seeking fast, reliable, high-quality drywall corner installation results. It ensures that every corner is finished to perfection.

name: Clinch-On Cornerbead Tool- 1-1/8"
description_short: Clinch-On Tool - 1-1/8"
description_full:
Clinch-On Tool - 1-1/8"

Experience effortless drywall corner installations with the CC Corp Clinch-On Tool, the leading choice for professionals seeking quick and flawless corner bead applications. Renowned for its efficiency and precision, this tool significantly reduces installation time and ensures flawlessly smooth and flush corners.

Key Features:

Efficient Application:

A simple strike from a rubber mallet tightly secures the corner bead, perfectly aligns it for optimal joint compound distribution, and clinches it into position without the need for nails or screws.

Ensures Smooth, Flush Corners:

This product is designed to create seamless, visually appealing corners, enhancing the finish of any drywall project.

Versatility:

Also available in a 1-1/4" size to accommodate different drywall thicknesses and project requirements.

The CC Corp Clinch-On Tool is your go-to for faster, cleaner, and more reliable drywall corner bead installation, ensuring professional results every time.

name: Columbia "Sawed Off" Mini Automatic Taper
description_short: TheColumbia "Sawed Off" Automatic Taperis a precision-built tool that is back by popular demand. This tool will tape flats and angles effortlessly year after year. From less drag in the corners to easily remove the cap for cleaning, this tool will not let you down. A hard-anodized tube eliminates the track lines that occur on so many other tools. Stainless steel side plates and cable drum and creaser arms offer a lifetime of corrosion resistance. Every taper comes standard with an adjustable bra
description_full:
The

Columbia "Sawed Off" Automatic Taper

is a precision-built tool that is back by popular demand. This tool will tape flats and angles effortlessly year after year. From less drag in the corners to easily remove the cap for cleaning, this tool will not let you down. A hard-anodized tube eliminates the track lines that occur on so many other tools. Stainless steel side plates and cable drum and creaser arms offer a lifetime of corrosion resistance. Every taper comes standard with an adjustable brake and quick release for tape changing. At 39", this taper is perfect for tight spaces such as stairwells, closets, scaffold, and low ceilings. If you are serious about taping and care how a taper feels and performs this is the one for you.

name: Columbia 12" Drywall Flat Finishing Box
description_short: TheColumbia 12" Drywall Flat Finishing Boxis a high-quality tool for quickly and efficiently finishing drywall surfaces. Made from durable materials, this finishing box is built to withstand frequent use and delivers consistent results every time. Its precision-engineered parts ensure a smooth and even application of joint compound, leaving a perfect finish without any air pockets or ridges.
description_full:
The

Columbia 12" Drywall Flat Finishing Box

is a high-quality tool for quickly and efficiently finishing drywall surfaces. Made from durable materials, this finishing box is built to withstand frequent use and delivers consistent results every time. Its precision-engineered parts ensure a smooth and even application of joint compound, leaving a perfect finish without any air pockets or ridges.

This finishing box has a 12" blade that covers a large area, allowing you to finish larger surfaces in less time. It is lightweight, making it easy to handle and maneuver, even when working on ceilings or walls. The blade is adjustable and can be set to a range of thicknesses, depending on the requirements of your project.

The Columbia 12" Drywall Flat Finishing Box is also designed for easy cleaning, with a removable lid that makes it easy to access and clean the internal components. Its sturdy construction, and advanced features make it an ideal choice for professional contractors and DIY enthusiasts who want a flawless finish on their drywall projects.

5-Year Columbia Warranty.

name: Columbia 24" Drywall Corner Finishing Compound Mud Tube
description_short:
Introducing the

Columbia 24" Compound Mud Tube

. The compound tube acts like a giant syringe for drywall compound. Simply place the head of the compound tube into the bucket of compound and pull the plunger handle out. This method will suck the mud out of the bucket and fill the tube. All major brands of attachments will work with this tube. The anodized aluminum main tube is very strong and will not break like some of the other brands that make them out of plastic.

This tube will work with:

name: Columbia 3" Nail Spotter with Featherlight Handle
description_short: Columbia Taping Tools 3" Nail Spotteris an excellent choice for finishing nail and screw holes.  Simply fill the Columbia Nail Spotter with joint compound and run it down the fasteners like your flat box.  It simultaneously fills and feathers the holes.  43" Columbia One Handle included.

description_full:
Introducing the

Columbia 4" Flat Applicator Head

, a versatile and reliable tool designed to streamline your drywall finishing projects. Crafted with precision and built to last, this applicator head is a must-have for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike.

The Columbia 4" Flat Applicator Head excels at effortlessly spreading joint compound on flat surfaces, providing smooth and even coverage. Its 4-inch width allows for efficient application, minimizing the time and effort required to achieve flawless results. Whether you're working on walls, ceilings, or other large areas, this applicator head will help you quickly achieve a professional finish.

Designed for compatibility and ease of use, the Columbia 4" Flat Applicator Head seamlessly attaches to all compound tubes, corner boxes, or Mudrunners.

name: Columbia 60" 180-Grip Bent Flat Box Handle
description_short: Columbia 60" 180 Degree Grip Flat Box Handle
description_full:
Columbia 60" 180 Degree Grip Flat Box Handle

Boost your drywall project efficiency with the Columbia 60" 180-Grip Bent Flat Box Handle, engineered for superior control and precision. This handle is designed to provide exceptional braking capability across a 180° angle, ensuring steady grip and preventing slippage during complex angle applications for a faster, cleaner joint compound application.

Outstanding Features and Benefits:

Enhanced Control and Leverage:

The bent handle design significantly improves leverage, making it ideal for tackling butt joints and headers with less effort and more precision.

Durable Construction:

Constructed from extra-strong billet aluminum, this handle is built to last, even under the most rugged conditions. Its minimalist design reduces moving parts, lowering the risk of breakdowns.

Optimal Comfort and Efficiency:

The handle's 1 1/4" thick pipe balances durability with ease of use, providing comfort without sacrificing strength. Its 180-degree grip offers continuous braking throughout its range of motion, ensuring consistent performance.

Additional Handle Features:

Ideal for Various Applications:

Perfect for walls, butt joints, and ceiling work, enhancing versatility.

Ergonomic Clamp Style 180 Brake:

Offers simplicity in operation and increased durability.

Lightweight yet Strong:

This handle is among the lightest yet most robust on the market. It features black anodizing and laser engraving for a professional finish.

Wide cOMPADABILITY:

Works with all leading brand boxes except TapeWorm, adding to its practicality.

The Columbia 60" 180 Degree Grip Flat Box Handle is a top choice for professional drywallers seeking enhanced productivity, control, and longevity in their tools.

Ideal for high ceilings, enhancing leverage without scaffolding.

Durable Construction:

Built with robust billet aluminum, designed for rugged use and longevity.

Comfort and Efficiency:

Features a 1 and 1/4" thick, lightweight design pipe that reduces fatigue during extended use.

Additional Benefits:

High-Quality Finish:

Black anodizing and laser engraving provide a professional look and extra durability.

Compatibility:

Works with most leading brand boxes, excluding TapeWorm.

The Columbia 72" handle is the professional's choice for achieving flawless drywall finishes efficiently and comfortably.

Sawed Off 39"

Columbia One Predator Taper

Built on the proven performance of the original Predator Taper, this upgraded model adds a fully

removable head

system featuring

two quick-release mechanisms

and three

draw latches

, making cleaning dramatically faster and easier.

But the biggest advancement?

Interchangeable bodies.

Removable Taper Head with Quick-Release & Draw Latch:

Clean faster and easier with a fully detachable head system.

One Head, Three Bodies:

Have the option to buy the Sawed Off and Tall Boy bodies to have 3 different sizes but one head.

Carbon Fiber Construction:

Lighter, stronger, dent-proof, and warm to the touch.

And best of all, the

price will remain the same

as the original Tall Boy Predator Taper.

Plus, with the removable head,

repair shipping becomes far more affordable

since you no longer need to ship the entire taper—just the head.

name: Columbia PREDATOR "Sawed Off" Mini Carbon Fiber Automatic Taper
description_short: TheColumbia PREDATOR "Sawed Off" Mini Carbon Fiber Automatic Taper, a state-of-the-art drywall taping tool, is the world's first Mini Carbon Fiber Taper that revolutionizes drywall taping efficiency. Standing out from the crowd with its superior carbon fiber construction, the Predator is 20% lighter and more robust than standard mini tapers. It ensures temperature stability with its dent-proof carbon fiber build, providing a warm and comfortable grip during use. An upgrade in the design has intr
description_full:
The

Columbia PREDATOR "Sawed Off" Mini Carbon Fiber Automatic Taper

, a state-of-the-art drywall taping tool, is the world's first Mini Carbon Fiber Taper that revolutionizes drywall taping efficiency. Standing out from the crowd with its superior carbon fiber construction, the Predator is 20% lighter and more robust than standard mini tapers. It ensures temperature stability with its dent-proof carbon fiber build, providing a warm and comfortable grip during use. An upgrade in the design has introduced teflon sliders for the 6 wheel cutting sleeve, making gliding smoother and grip better, ensuring effortless taping of flats and angles. The quick-release cap, stainless steel side plates, cable drum, and creaser arms enhance the product's durability and ease of cleaning. Designed for confined spaces like small rooms and closets, the compact 42" Predator taper outshines full-sized 52" tapers in both convenience and functionality.

name: Columbia PREDATOR Carbon Fiber Automatic Taper
description_short: TheColumbia Predator Automatic Taperis the world's first Carbon Fiber Taper and the benefits that come with this are endless. The Columbia Taper is a precision-built tool that has been perfected over 38 years, but now it is also20% lighterthan all other tapers on the market anddent-proof. This tool will tape flats and angles effortlessly year after year. From less drag in the corners to our easy to remove cap for cleaning, this tool will not let you down.
description_full:
The

Columbia Predator Automatic Taper

is the world's first Carbon Fiber Taper and the benefits that come with this are endless. The Columbia Taper is a precision-built tool that has been perfected over 38 years, but now it is also

20% lighter

than all other tapers on the market and

dent-proof

. This tool will tape flats and angles effortlessly year after year. From less drag in the corners to our easy to remove cap for cleaning, this tool will not let you down.

Stainless steel side plates and cable drum and creaser arms offer a lifetime of corrosion resistance. The 6 wheel cutting sleeve gives the operator a smoother glide, superb grip and the pull ring is great for higher ceilings. The Predator maintains its stable temperature and remains warm to the touch. Every taper comes standard with an adjustable brake and quick release for tape changing. The Titanium pull rod is just another detail that adds style and edge to this innovative, unique taper. If you are serious about taping and care how a taper feels and performs this is the one for you.

description_full:

Engineered to withstand the rigors of travel and the harsh environment of work sites, the Road Case offers unmatched protection for your tool set. name: Columbia Semi Auto Taper Drywall Taping Tool
description_short: Columbia Semi Auto Taperor "Bucket Taper" allows you to apply a specific amount of compound to a large volume of tape.  No additional tools needed.  Simply attach the Columbia Semi-Automatic Taper to a 5-Gallon bucket of compound and pull the tape through it.   Very simple to use and even a beginner can use it with very little effort.  It’s a great little tool for even the professionals that are doing smaller jobs and do not want to pull out their automatic taper.

name: Columbia Tactical Set with Predator Upgrade It's what you've been waiting for
description_short: This comprehensive kit makes putting together your automatic taping tools effortless, featuring the crown jewel – Columbia's upgraded, Predator Carbon Fiber Automatic Taper. Built for true professionals who demand precision and reliability, this isn't just another tool set.
description_full:
This comprehensive kit makes putting together your automatic taping tools effortless, featuring the crown jewel – Columbia's upgraded, Predator Carbon Fiber Automatic Taper. Built for true professionals who demand precision and reliability, this isn't just another tool set.

Every taping tool you need to finish an entire house comes perfectly organized in our battle-tested Road Case. From corner beads to flat joints, the Predator Tactical Set eliminates the second-guessing and gives you everything required to tackle any job with confidence.

No need to piece your toolkit together when you can have it all in one go. And with financing available, stepping up to professional-grade has never been more accessible.

Start dominating your craft and look cool doing it.

SET INCLUDES

Road Case, RC

Predator Automatic Taper, TAPER

10″ Flat Box, 10FFB

12″ Flat Box, 12FFB

Matrix Handle, MH

7″ Tomahawk, TSB7

24″ Tomahawk, TSB24

8″ Throttle Box, 8CFB

3″

Anglehead

, 3AH

Hot Mud Pump, HMP

Box Filler, BF

Gooseneck, GN

Corner Roller, CR

AHA Angle Adapter, AHA

3″ Nail Spotter, 3NS

Columbia One Handle and Columbia One EXT, C1H

Sander Head, CS

Twist Lock

Handle,  L

38

Tomalock

Adapter, CLTHA

A word from Columbia:

"

MADE PROUDLY IN NORTH AMERICA

When we say “commercial grade”, we mean it. Other companies may pretend to care about quality while still having their parts and tools made in China from cheap materials. Every Columbia product is manufactured from scratch right here in North America with the highest quality North American steel, rubber, plastic and aluminum. Cheap production can’t stand up to the beating tools can take on the job site, which is why we believe so strongly in building our own tools from the ground up to ensure their durability and quality. We’re serious, your Columbia tool will last so long, it might just become a family heirloom."

The quick-release allows you to easily and steadily adjust the angle of attack. name: DeWalt 10 Gallon Wet/Dry HEPA Dust Extractor with Auto Filter Cleaning
description_short: Introducing DeWalt's new 10 gallon drywall / shop vacuum.  This is one powerful vac.  It has many nice features, such as twin HEPA filters, automatic filter cleaning, and a higher power rating compared to older models.  The power outlet on the vac is one of the nicest features especially when using a Porter Cable drywall sander with it.
description_full:
Introducing DeWalt's new 10 gallon drywall / shop vacuum.  This is one powerful vac.  It has many nice features, such as twin HEPA filters, automatic filter cleaning, and a higher power rating compared to older models.  The power outlet on the vac is one of the nicest features especially when using a Porter Cable drywall sander with it.

Features:

Automatic filter clean pulses every 30 seconds for continuous operations without stopping to clean filter

Powerful 15 amp motor delivers 140 CFM of airflow for maximum suction

Power Tool Actuation controls on/off operations of the vacuum with a power tool

Variable suction controls vacuum's power consumption and amount of suction

Telescoping handle for easy transport

Universal hose connector provides a robust connection with swivel capability

Lightweight and portable that weighs in at only 33.5 lbs.

Multiple lift and tie down points to secure vacuum to scaffolding or during transportation

Simple one switch operation to select tool actuation or vacuum only

Unit comes fully assembled

Can be used with wet or dry applications

This feature senses the motion of the tool and shuts it down if ne
description_full:
The

DEWALT 60V MAX Mixer/Drill with E-Clutch System

has over 2X the power of our corded mixer allowing it to easily mix thin set, tile mortar, and fiber reinforced concrete. In addition to mixing, the powerful brushless motor allows the DCD130 to tackle demanding drilling applications. In order to improve control, the Mixer/Drill has anti-rotation E-Clutch System, which offers technology capable of detecting the motion of the tool. This feature senses the motion of the tool and shuts it down if necessary. The red indicator LED illuminates when the E-Clutch System is engaged.

Integrated E-clutch system helps to improve user control

3-position side handle allows for optimum position while mixing

Continuous variable speed trigger allows the correct speed to be found

name: Drywall Master  10" & 12" Inside Track Flat Finishing Box Set W/ 42" Handle
description_short: Drywall Master Inside Track Flat Box Set W/ 42" Handle
description_full:
Drywall Master Inside Track Flat Box Set W/ 42" Handle

Drywall Master Taping Tools are backed by an outstanding 5-year warranty. Drywall Master Tools are built to last and will offer years of trouble-free operation. Compatible with all of the top brands, Drywall Master Flat Box Set Sale is the ideal fit for contractors of any size. This set is pre-configured with 10" and 12" Inside Track boxes and a 42" box handle, which is suitable for reaching 9ft ceilings for most users.  Inside Track High Capacity Finishing Boxes are built to help you conquer hard-to-finish areas. With fixed axel wheels set inside the width of the box profile, letting the blade leave a clean finish, great for finishing beads and butt joints.

Drywall Master Flat Boxes feature a Rapid Clean lid for easy cleanup. The boxes are assembled with a classic brass blade holder design, and all major brand blades and skids will fit, including TapeTech. The Pump is built with a removable tube and inset o-ring that eliminates tube binding. The Drywall Master Sure-Stop Handle is a 180 brake anywhere style design that allows for greater flexibility.

Quick Clean Compound Loading Pump

Box Filler Adapter

10" Inside Track Flat Finishing Box (no pivot axel)

12" Inside Track Flat Finishing Box (no pivot axel)

42" Flat Box Handle

quickly fill nail or screw divots. Simply fill the spotter with the Loading Pump and Pump Filler Adapter and go.

name: Drywall Master 3" BoneHead Corner Finisher w/ Wheels
description_full:
Introducing the

Drywall Master 3" BoneHead Speed Wheels Corner Finisher

- the ultimate solution for achieving professional-quality corner finishes in drywall. Crafted with rugged durability and precise engineering, this corner finisher is a game-changer for contractors and DIY enthusiasts.

The Drywall Master 3" BoneHead Speed Wheels Corner Finisher boasts rugged and beefy blade frames that are meticulously precision-machined from a single solid piece of superior-grade stainless steel. This design eliminates corrosion concerns and eliminates welds that could potentially break under pressure. With its CNC machined body and blade frames, this corner finisher ensures ultimate reliability and consistent performance.

Designed for versatility, the 3" BoneHead With Wheels is compatible with any corner angle box or angle head handle. It is specifically engineered for tape coat or smooth and consistent finishing of inside drywall corner angles. The compact 3" size allows for precise application in tight spaces and delivers seamless results every time.

Experience the all-new Locking Clip System, a notable feature of the Drywall Master BoneHead Finishers. Equipped with a secure locking clip, this corner finisher ensures a tight and reliable attachment to any angle head handle, corner box, or other applicators with an ATF ball. Say goodbye to costly drops or unexpected detachments during your work. This innovative locking mechanism not only protects your investment but also saves valuable time by minimizing interruptions and adjustments.

In summary, the Drywall Master 3" BoneHead Speed Wheels Corner Finisher is a high-performance tool that combines rugged durability, precise engineering, and innovative features. With its superior stainless steel construction, CNC machining, compatibility with various angle head handles, and the added security of the Locking Clip System, this corner finisher is the perfect choice for achieving impeccable corner finishes in your drywall projects. Invest in the Drywall Master 3" BoneHead Speed Wheels Corner Finisher today and experience a new level of efficiency and precision in your work.

name: Drywall Master 7" Speed Clean Flat Box
description_short: Introducing the Drywall Master 7" Speed Clean Flat Box– Crafted from Durable Alloys for Long-Lasting Performance!
description_full:
Introducing the Drywall Master 7" Speed Clean Flat Box

– Crafted from Durable Alloys for Long-Lasting Performance!

Our flat box is expertly constructed using high-quality alloys designed to withstand frequent and extended use. Equipped with a robust tie-rod system, these boxes are built for unmatched strength and durability. They are undeniably sturdy!

The Speed Clean design streamlines the cleanup process, featuring fast-release door clips and an easily accessible lid. The 7" Drywall Master flat finisher box is the perfect choice for applying the base mud coat to flat seams, butt joints, or corner beads. Moreover, the DMT 7" Flat Finisher box is compatible with handles from other leading taping tool brands, offering flexibility and convenience.

Flat finisher boxes are adaptable to various ceiling and wall heights using different box braking handles, ensuring optimal finishing results. With its user-friendly dial adjustment, you can finely control the mud output, achieving a smooth and consistently feathered finish on drywall flat seams and butt joints every time.

name: Drywall Master Commander Carbon Fiber Automatic Taper
description_short: The drywall MasterCommander Automatic Taperis made ofCarbon Fiber.  This gives the taper a lighter feel and keeps the temperature down in cold environments.
description_full:
The drywall Master

Commander Automatic Taper

is made of

Carbon Fiber

.  This gives the taper a lighter feel and keeps the temperature down in cold environments.

As with all Drywall Master Automatic Tapers, the Commander features an adjustable brake roller that modifies tension. The grip tape on the drive dog assembly and knurled control tube improve grip, even in the wettest conditions. The easy-to-remove patented cover plate makes routine maintenance hassle-free. A two-piece control tube pull ring allows the taper to reach high ceilings while minimizing fatigue, and the spool keeper has an innovative mechanism that prevents backspin.

The Commander Carbon Fiber Automatic Taper has interchangeable parts that are compatible with all major brands, so your investment will never be obsolete. Every tool is designed to exceed performance and reliability.

Simplified Cleaning & Easy Maintenance

Our patented cover plates remove without the hassle of dealing with any screws to simplify cleaning and routine maintenance. It has the highest level of interchangeability with other major brands for easy access to parts. The internal push rod assembly is made of stainless steel, so it won’t strip over time.

Smoothest Running Taper & Soft Cutting Action

It is designed to have the least drag on any brand's control tube, resulting in soft-cutting action. It features an adjustable brake roller to control tension and ensure the taper runs smoothly. We also added a control arm stabilizer to ensure that the control arm stays in place at all times.

Complete User Control for Less Fatigue and Improved Grip

The knurled control tube improves grip under wet and slippery conditions. The trigger's contoured rubber cover prevents blistered fingers. We also added grip tape to the Drive Dog Assembly to prevent fingers from slipping.

Durable & Light-Weight Construction

The carbon fiber tube reduces the weight of the taper while making it dent-proof.

Reach Higher Heights

The 2-piece Control Tube Pull Ring allows the taper to reach higher ceilings. The pull ring can be removed or replaced by the user with 4 screws.

No Tape Spool Back Spin

Our patented attached tape spool keeper has an adjustment mechanism to prevent the backspin of the tape spool during use.

Built to Last with Aircraft Quality Stainless Steel

Made from aircraft quality alloys and stainless steel and the side plates are made with stainless steel for increased strength.

name: Dura-Stilts Dura-III Adjustable Drywall Stilts 14"-22"
description_short: TheDura-Stilt III 14-22"stilt has reigned as the ultimate icon of modern stilt designs for over three decades.
description_full:
The

Dura-Stilt III 14-22"

stilt has reigned as the ultimate icon of modern stilt designs for over three decades.

The Dura-III is the undisputed leader and most recognized articulating leg extension device in the world today. It is the best selling stilt ever and is the industry standard throughout the industrialized world. The Dura-III stilts feature such things as semi-flexible foot plates and floor plates, nylon leg bearings at all pivot points, beefed up adjustment hole walls, steel wing-bolt inserts, nylon sleeves in the adjustable legs, a universally adjustable side leg support which does not need to be re-adjusted when the stilts are adjusted for height, commercial grade strap webbing, self locking buckles and genuine reinforced rubber soles.

All components are field replaceable for stilt renew-ability and longevity.

The Dura-III is the standard for discerning tradesmen and has an international track record of proven reliability.

description_short: New Dura-Stilt IVFeatherweight drywall stilts feature a clam-shell style leg band that opens, closes and buckles quickly and securely.  The band is attached to the leg support tube allowing limited vertical movement of the entire leg band to accommodate various leg shapes. description_full:
New Dura-Stilt IV

Featherweight drywall stilts feature a clam-shell style leg band that opens, closes and buckles quickly and securely.  The band is attached to the leg support tube allowing limited vertical movement of the entire leg band to accommodate various leg shapes. The clam-shell leg band is made of a specially selected lightweight yet tough space age material which not only makes the new leg attachment system lighter but also flexes to conform even better to the user's leg.  They are very comfortable.

Features:

The new design makes possible a quick in and out, rear entry, sandal style foot attachment system

An optional genuine

Lambs Wool Kit

is available for even more cushion and comfort

Dura-Stilt IV stilts are 1 pound lighter than the Dura-Stilt III models

Lifetime Structural Warranty

name: DustLock Reusable Drywall Dust Bag – Heavy-Duty, Washable Dust Filter Bag
description_short: Keep your workspace clean, efficient, and eco-conscious with theDustLock Reusable Shop Vac Bag. This high-grade filter bag is engineered to trap fine particles as small as 1 micron, keeping your vacuum’s filter from clogging and extending its life, even during heavy-duty jobs.
description_full:
DustLock Reusable Shop Vac Bag - Heavy-Duty, Washable, and OSHA-Friendly Dust Collection Solution

Keep your workspace clean, efficient, and eco-conscious with the

DustLock Reusable Shop Vac Bag

. This high-grade filter bag is engineered to trap fine particles as small as 1 micron, keeping your vacuum’s filter from clogging and extending its life, even during heavy-duty jobs.

Designed to capture drywall dust, cement dust, saw dust, and more, the DustLock bag features a convenient zipper for easy emptying and an easy-to-use twist clamp that fits most standard wet/dry vacuum models with a 2.5" intake nozzle. With high capacity, this bag reduces the need for frequent emptying, so you can focus on the job at hand. When it’s time to clean, wash by hand or in the washing machine, then air dry—it’s ready to lock in dust again!

Note:

Not intended for use with wet items.

Key Features:

DustLock Filtration Technology:

Provides superior dust containment, capturing particles as fine as 1 micron and keeping your vacuum filter from clogging for longer-lasting performance.

Zippered Emptying System:

Conveniently empty debris with the built-in zipper, making cleanup quick, easy, and mess-free.

Twist Clamp Compatibility:

Comes with an easy-to-use twist clamp that fits almost all standard-sized wet/dry vacuum models with a 2.5" intake nozzle, making it a versatile choice for most users.

High Capacity for Fewer Changes:

Large volume reduces the need for frequent emptying, boosting productivity and convenience for lengthy projects.

Durable & Reusable:

Constructed from heavy-duty, tear-resistant materials to withstand rigorous use. Washable and reusable for a sustainable, long-term performance.

OSHA-Friendly Solution:

While not disposable, this reusable DustLock bag offers high-efficiency dust containment, suitable for an environmentally friendly, OSHA-aligned solution.

Simple Maintenance:

Easy to clean by hand or in the washing machine, making it as practical as it is robust. Air-dry for a fresh, ready-to-go filter.

The

DustLock Reusable Shop Vac Bag

is your eco-friendly alternative to disposable options, providing both durability and top-notch dust control to tackle the toughest cleaning tasks—while ensuring your vacuum filter stays cleaner, longer.

The new generation PLANEX long-reach sander is revolutionizing drywall finishing – with LED light and eccentric rotation. The all-around LED light ring works like a built-in grazing light and reveals any unevenness during sanding. eccentric sanding motion for scratch-free surface quality

name: Festool Dust Extractor CLEANTEC CT 36 E AC HEPA
description_short: No more clogged filters – the AUTOCLEAN (AC) automatic main filter cleaning keeps the filter clean and provides a continuously high suction power. The CT 36 EI AC is designed to be used with the PLANEX and PLANEX easy drywall sanders. With its huge container capacity of 36 l, the CT 36 AC provides maximum volume and a high degree of flexibility. Equipped with swiveling castor wheels and rear wheels for optimum mobility. It also has a locking brake that provides stability on any surface as well a
description_full:
No more clogged filters – the AUTOCLEAN (AC) automatic main filter cleaning keeps the filter clean and provides a continuously high suction power. The CT 36 EI AC is designed to be used with the PLANEX and PLANEX easy drywall sanders. With its huge container capacity of 36 l, the CT 36 AC provides maximum volume and a high degree of flexibility. Equipped with swiveling castor wheels and rear wheels for optimum mobility. It also has a locking brake that provides stability on any surface as well as during transport. The flat filter fully integrated in the suction head ensures the full volume is utilized: This means that the gross and net container volumes are virtually identical. The extremely compact high-performance turbine provides the right suction power. A 137 CFM (3900 l/min) volume flow means that nothing remains except clean air.

AUTOCLEAN automatic main filter cleaning system with infinitely adjustable cleaning intervals for consistently high suction power

Can be individually retrofitted with an additional compressed air or Bluetooth® module for remote control on the suction hose or automatic start via the Bluetooth® battery pack.

OSHA Table 1 Silica dust control solution for the applications outlined as; iii, vii, viii, x, xi, xii (always check your local guidelines to ensure the proper equipment and PPE is being used for the given application)

Smooth suction hose and optimized SYS-Dock with cord holder and T-LOC function for conveniently connecting Systainers to the mobile dust extractor

Antistatic function prevents static developing during work

ComfortClean closing slide (accessory) for even more powerful cleaning

Attachment of Systainers via SYS-Dock

Hose garage and cable windup for greater tidiness and safety

Economical because of the optimal use of the available volume with a SELFCLEAN filter bag in the container

Container/filter bag capacity 36/34 l

With AUTOCLEAN function

The industry's most portable sprayer allows you to spray in the tightest of areas with precision and the highest control. Durable long-life triple piston pump

Spray small amounts FAST

Power to Take on Every Small Job

Spray up to one gallon on each battery

Ultimate Hands-Free Portability With Belt and Holster Attachment

Genuine Graco Endurance Pumps lead the industry in durability and ease of installation. Keep a spare on hand to minimize downtime in the field.

Replacement pump for

TexSpray Mark IV Standard Series sprayers model year 2019 and newer

.

Lasts 2X longer than the next leading brand

Chromex rod and hardened stainless steel cylinder

Long Life V-Max Blue Packings

Faster cleaning with the QuikAccess intake valve

Repack the pump in minutes with the new QuikPak Cartridge System

name: Graco External Compressor Connection Kit #287328
description_short: Graco RTX Auxiliary Air Kit 287328 for RTX 1500 allows use of external air supply for greater atomization at spray gun. (Requires user-supplied compressor with minimum output 10 cfm @ 100 psi)
description_full: Graco RTX Auxiliary Air Kit 287328 for RTX 1500 allows use of external air supply for greater atomization at spray gun. (Requires user-supplied compressor with minimum output 10 cfm @ 100 psi)
